forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain. Cloudy. Low around 55, with temperatures rising to around 57 overnight. West southwest wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 8am. Mostly cloudy. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In the early hours of a gray San Francisco morning, a whisper of precipitation dances in the air, casting a shroud of dampness that clings to the city. Soft clouds blanket the sky, hinting at the promise of rain with temperatures nudging around fifty-five degrees that will slowly rise to the fifty-seventh mark. An invigorating wind from the west-southwest has picked up, rustling through the streets with gusts that reach up to thirty-one miles per hour, creating a brisk ambiance that may nudge you to pull your coat a little closer.

As the day unfolds, the chance of rain lingers, especially before the sun fully rises. The skies will remain mostly cloudy, shedding a soft light over the iconic cityscape. With temperatures expected to hover near fifty-nine, then gently dip in the afternoon, it may feel considerably cooler against the backdrop of the ever-watchful marine layer cloaked in mist, offering a delicate ballet between clarity and haze. This weather calls for a blend of comfort and resilience; a warm scarf and a sturdy umbrella will serve you well. In the midst of this elusive calm, consider meandering through the fog-laden streets or perhaps enjoying a quiet morning coffee in one of the vibrant local cafés. Such a day is perfect for introspection or for catching up on that book you've been meaning to dive into, as the city exhales in gentle anticipation of the rain.
